sentences.en: His pockets are full of red lead and verdigris.
sentences.cn: 他的衣袋里装满铅丹和铜绿.

sentences.en: Verdigris has spread all over that abandoned copper pot.
sentences.cn: 那把已经废弃的铜壶上长满了铜锈.

words.tran_cn: [有化]铜锈，[材]铜绿；碱式碳酸铜

trans.tran_en: a greenish-blue substance that sometimes appears on copper or brass
